member.name: P:ChartFX.WinForms.Gauge.Gauge.MainIndicator
member.summary: Gets or sets the main Indicator. The available indicators for a RadialGauge are the <a href="Needle">Needle and the <a href="Marker">Marker. As for the <a href="LinearGauge">LinearGauge, the <a href="Filler">Filler and the <a href="Marker">Marker are the two possible types of indicators. Cast the return value to either a Needle, a Marker, or a Filler in order to set the style or other specific properties.

member.summary: Returns a formatted string of a value.

member.name: M:ChartFX.WinForms.Gauge.ValueFormat.FormatValue(System.Double)

member.param: The value to format.
